body:
Hi all,


Just to say thanks to everyone again, ive made and tested my ies file and it works! the illuminance values i get are slightly off from the real world measurements ive taken, but this can easily be recitified with changing my guestimates from the photometric data. wahoo!


just measured the light in real world rob, at a distance of 3.5m i got an illuminance value of 145,500 lux max. its quite hot standing there let me tell ya!


chris
